subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The demolitions of Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium will not resemble those of Ebbets Field or the Polo Grounds in two significant ways: No wrecking balls and no explosive charges.
snippet: The demolitions of Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium will not resemble those of Ebbets Field or the Polo Grounds in two significant ways: No wrecking balls and no explosive charges.
